thread.title_full: MPPEB Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 3339 ANM, Female Supervisor & Other Posts

author: publisher12
title: MPPEB Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 3339 ANM, Female Supervisor & Other Posts
text: Click here for Drug Inspector Post Details MPPEB Recruitment 2017 – Apply Online for 2964 ANM, Lab Technician & Other Posts: Madhya Pradesh Professional Examination Board (MPPEB) has published notification for the recruitment of 2964 Lab Technician, Lab Assistant, Lab Attender, Radiographer, OT Technician, Radiography Technician, EEG Technician & other (Group 5) vacancies. Eligible candidates may apply online from 27-02-2017 to 13-03-2017. Other details like age limit, educational qualification, selection process, application fee & how to apply are given below…. MPPEB Vacancy Details: Total No. of Posts: 2964 Name of the Post: Group 5 1. Lab Technician: 197 Posts 2. Lab Assistant: 09 Posts 3. Lab Attender: 06 Posts 4. Radiographer: 141 Posts 5. OT Technician: 01 Post 6. Radiography Technician: 06 Posts 7. EEG Technician: 01 Post 8. Prosthetic Technician: 01 Post 9. Assistant Veterinary Field Officer: 215 Posts 10. Female Multipurpose Health Worker (ANM): 1798 Posts 11. Lab Assistant (Medical): 01 Post 13. Ophthalmic Assistant: 63 Posts 14. Pharmacist: 525 Posts Age Limit: Candidates age limit should be between 18 – 40 years. Age relaxation is applicable up to 45 years for SC/ ST/ OBC/ Women candidates. For more relaxation details refer the notification. Educational Qualification : Candidates should possess 10+2 for Post No. 01 to 03 & 05, 10+2 and Diploma in Radiography for Post No. 04 and madhyamic pass/ 10+2 for Post No 10. For more qualification details refer the notification. Selection Process: Candidates will be selected based on the Exam. Application Fee: Candidates should pay Rs. 500/- (Rs. 70/- (Portal Charges) for Online application and Rs. 40/- for Offline application) for Unreserved category candidates and Rs. 250/- (Rs. 70/- (Portal Charges) for Online application and Rs. 40/- for Offline application) for SC/ST/ OBC candidates through online or off line. For more fee details refer the notification. How to Apply: Eligible candidates may apply online through the website www.mponline.gov.in from 27-02-2017 to 13-03-2017. Instructions to Apply Online: 1. Before applying online candidates has to scan their photograph, signature. 2. Log on to website www.mponline.gov.in 3. Click on Professional Examination Board & Select the desired post 4. Click on Apply & Read all instructions 5. Fill all the details & submit the form 6. Take print out of the submitted application form for further use. Important Dates: Starting Date to Apply Online 27-02-2017 Last Date to Apply Online 13-03-2017 Starting Date to Make Correction in the Application Form 27-02-2017 Last Date to Make Correction in the Application Form 18-03-2017
